events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and will start the review process shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department focused on software development roles.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to assist you through the hiring process.
The initial screening interview has been completed with positive feedback on your technical knowledge and communication skills.
Thank you for promptly responding to our screening feedback and confirming your continued interest in the software engineer role.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 20th at 2 PM UTC with our senior developer team.
The technical interview was completed successfully with strong performance on coding challenges and system design questions.
We have scheduled your HR interview for April 25th at 11 AM UTC to discuss culture fit and benefits.
Your HR interview was completed positively with good alignment on company values and compensation expectations.
We have sent you an official offer for the Software Engineer position, including details on salary, benefits, and start date.
Thank you for your feedback; you have expressed enthusiasm about the offer and the opportunity to join our engineering team.
We are delighted to confirm that you have accepted the offer and we look forward to welcoming you onboard.
Your onboarding process has started; you will receive all necessary resources and schedules to integrate smoothly into the engineering team.
The recruitment process has been successfully closed with your official hire as a Software Engineer at our company.
